Content: The much-anticipated meeting between US President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong-un will take place at a hotel on the Singaporean island of Sentosa, the White House has confirmed. The historic summit is scheduled to take place on 12th of this month, but many details are still unconfirmed. It will be the first meeting between a North Korean leader and a sitting US president. White House press secretary Sarah Sanders confirmed on Twitter that the summit would take place at the five-star Capella Hotel.
